inclusion.criterion: YIPTA, BDI, EPDS, STAI, PSI, NMR, ERC, IOS, PBI, EQ and IRI questionnaires administered
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: salivary OXT samples collected from infant and parent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mid-point clinical evaluation at outpatient Psychiatric Department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 8 weeks of dyadic psychotherapy (DP) combining video feedback
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: salivary OXT, Estradiol, Progesterone, SIGA and Vasopressin samples collected from mother and infant at each session
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: final end-of-study clinical evaluation at 12 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother-infant interaction filmed and assessed using CIB Manual and NOLDOS coding system
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: women screening score of Depression EPDS<10 (Edinburgh questionnaire)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: women diagnosed with Bipolar disorder or Schizophrenia, delirium, psychosis *due to drug abuse, OCD
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: high risk for self and other injury
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 22yo F with systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine. CBC was at baseline, serum tryptase revealed high value at 84. Patient failed aspirin challenge due to adverse reaction.
